body: Is that true for all request types?

Can we just replace 'null' string to empty one for all types? What is the reason we didn't do it at very beginning?

https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/blob/39d3b6519cf37353cf372f8370792ed4171fc780/tests/framework/web/JsonResponseFormatterTest.php#L191-L196
The 204 response must respond with an empty body, this is a priority over the json format specification.
The case should be covered with a test.

issue.title: fix 204 response

body: The null response broke yiisoft/yii2-jui's AutoComplete object. A extra null was appended in the JSON response. Downgrading to 2.0.15.1 confirmed the issue is with 2.0.16. Will apply the patch and try again.

Yes, the problem remains for me. The AutoComplete widget expects a json object to display the popup menu. The object is returned, but there's also a `null` string at the end of it (if I pass the response through console.log).

And the status code in that case is 200.

Why didn't you start new issue?

As I can understand, the problem is about response content (not about AutoComplete widget, it is important). There is "null string at the end" appears somehow. So, let us see your generating code with input params.
I didn't start a new issue, because I thought it's related to this issue.

issue.title: 2.0.16 broke JSON responses

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?
Request content by json. For example, I use `yii\jui\AutoComplete` for a autocomplete box, but when I type, nothing happens, because I get a incorrent JSON response. I get the JSON object plus a `null` string at the end of it.

### What is the expected result?
I should get the autocomplete popup appear.

### What do you get instead?
Nothing. The popup does not appear, since the response cannot be parsed correctly.

### Additional info

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.16
| PHP version      | 7.2.14
| Operating system |Linux

This is related to issue #17094 with response http status 204. This issue is for http response 200 (it has content). Downgrading to 2.0.15.1 fixes the issue.

issue.title: echo null     null

issue.title: [Regression][yii\web\Response::prepare()] populates $response parameter on 204 No Content response

repository.name: yii2

issue.body:
### What steps will reproduce the problem?

On REST API send DELETE object request

If you test that in Codeception, it tells that it did not get any response even tho response was prepared

### What is the expected result?

should not get any response,
formatters are not executed
codeception is happy

### What do you get instead?

do not get any response,
formatters are executed
codeception is unhappy about response not recieved but was prepared

### Additional info

https://github.com/Codeception/Codeception/issues/5418

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.16.1
| PHP version      | 5.6
| Operating system | Ubuntu
